text:
Enemies can't blow up your Machines.

When this Base is blown up, put the top card of your Arsenal on top of your Backup Plans.
Remove up to two cards from under target Blueprint, Machine, or Base. Then if it's a Blueprint and has no cards under it, blow it up.
At the start of your turn, put the top card of your Arsenal under this card. Then if this card has 2 or more cards under it, liquidate it and put those cards into your hand.

Requires 1 Mook

Unique

When this Mook onboards or assaults, exchange up to two cards from your hand with that many cards from under one of your Blueprints.

Your Scientists get +4.

You can't be targeted by Schemes.
Fabricate a number of Machines equal to your current Turn count or 3, whichever is lower.

Requires 1 Mook, 1 Machine

Unique

Once per turn, whenever one of your Mooks is blown up by an effect that isn't yours, draw a card.
Until the end of your next turn, Mooks can't assault.

Whenever you fabricate a Machine, put the top card of your Arsenal under this card. Then, if this card has three or more Mooks under it, blow up target Mook.

At the start of your turn, if this card has eight cards under it, you win the game.
For each of your Goons, target a Machine. Flip those Machines facedown.

You can't be assaulted by two or fewer Mooks.

Whenever this Base is blown up or liquidated, draw a card.

Requires 1 Machine

Gets +2 for each card in your hand.
Put up to three cards from the top of your Backup Plans into your hand, then put that many cards from your hand on top of your Backup Plans.

When you fabricate this Machine, target a Mook. It can't assault or block as long as you have Automatic Jumpscare.

When that Mook is blown up, liquidate this Machine.
Up to two target Mooks can't block until end of turn.

Whenever you play a Scheme, put it under this card instead of into your Garbage Pile.

At the start of your turn, if this card has eight Scheme cards under it, you win the game.
Whenever an enemy plays a Scheme, after that Scheme resolves, you can blow up this Mook. If you do, you can play a Scheme from your hand.
This Mook gets +2 for each Backup Plan you have less than 6.
If your Active Base would be blown up, you can blow up this Base instead. You can use this ability if this isn't your Active Base.
ðŸ”˜Liquidate 6 other nontoken Mooks: Charismatic Cult Leader becomes Myrianna, a Demon Leader with threat level 36 and gains invincible.
Give one of your Machines to another player.
When you declare an assault with this Mook, target Mook loses Skilled Defender until end of turn.
This Machine can assault as though it were a Mook with Threat Level 8.
Draw a card, then target Mook gets +X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
Target Mook gets -8 until end of turn.
Target one of your Mooks. It becomes a copy of another target Mook that isn't yours.
Target player reveals their hand. If they have more Mook cards in their hand than you have Mooks, put the top card of your Arsenal into your Backup Plans. Otherwise, draw a card.

factionAbility: When you would draw a card, you exploit instead. To exploit, reveal the top card of your Arsenal and put it under one of your Mooks or Machines, or into your hand. When you exploit an empty Arsenal, you win the game.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, choose two target machines. Blow up one of them and steal the other.
factionStaticAbility: Your Mooks get +1 for each card under them.
factionFlavorText: Look, we just have to sell another million... billion... trillion copies!

text:
Play this only when one of your Unique Mooks is blown up.

Blow up target Mook, Base, or Machine. If you do, draw a card.
Mooks get -3 from poison until end of turn.
Your other Mooks get +3 while assaulting.

At the start of your turn, put the top card of your Arsenal under this card.

At the end of your turn, if this card has three or more cards under it, discard them all. If you do, blow up any target.
Search your Arsenal for a Mook with Threat Level 4 or less, or a Machine, and put it into your hand. Toss two cards from the top of your Arsenal.
Blow up target Unique Mook or target Mook with threat level 8 or higher.
Vote for a Machine, then blow it up. If your choice was blown up this way, take control.

factionAbility: At the start of your turn, if you have 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, until end of turn, your Schemes can target Mooks and Machines that can't be targeted.
factionStaticAbility: Once per turn, whenever one of your Mooks is blown up by an ability, you can blow up target Mook with a lower threat level.
factionFlavorText: Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds.

text: Shuffle your hand into your Arsenal, then draw that many cards. Then, for each card drawn this way, up to one target Mook can't block this turn.
Whenever an opponent plays a Scheme, you can liquidate this Base to stop it.

Unique

This Machine counts toward one requirement of any type.

The first time you hire a Mook that has a requirement during your turn, draw a card.
Whenever an enemy declares an assault, you can target one of their Mooks. If you do, that Mook can't assault this turn.

You can play this whenever one of your Mooks is targeted or blocks.

Target Mook gets +6 until end of turn.
Whenever you would draw a card, you can blow up this Machine instead. If you do, search your Arsenal for a Blueprint and play it, then shuffle.

When this Mook onboards, put the top two cards of your Arsenal under it.

This Mook gets +2 for each card under it.

Requires 2 Machines

Whenever you declare an assault, hire a token Mook. Then you can blow up one of your tokens. If you do, target Mook gets +4 until end of turn.

Discard or liquidate a Mook as a cost.

Blow up target Base, then draw a card.

Requires 1 Mook, 1 Machine

You can play a second Scheme each turn.
When you're assaulted successfully, blow up this Machine instead of taking any Backup Plans.

factionAbility: You start the game with a Blueprint from your Arsenal in play.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, hire two token Mooks.
factionStaticAbility: Whenever you hire one or more token Mooks, you hire that many plus one instead.
factionFlavorText: Quickly, Igor, I need more victi-... test subj-... I need more willing participants!

text:
Play only when a player declares an assault on you.

Until end of turn, whenever a Mook assaults, it gets -2.
You can play an extra Scheme each turn.

factionAbility: When you would draw a card, you exploit instead. To exploit, reveal the top card of your Arsenal and put it under one of your Mooks or Machines, or into your hand. When you exploit an empty Arsenal, you win the game.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, steal target unique Mook.
factionStaticAbility: Whenever you take a Backup Plan, you can exploit after.
factionFlavorText: For our next movie, we'll blot out the sun with a giant ad! Think of the profits!

text:
Discard two cards as a cost. Draw two cards.

When you take this Scheme as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.
Reveal the top four cards of your Arsenal. Put all the Schemes among those cards into your hand, and toss the rest. You can play another Scheme this turn.
Put a card from your hand on top of your Backup Plans.

Requires 4 Mooks

Unique

Whenever another of your nontoken Mooks is blown up by an effect, hire a token Mook.
Whenever an enemy targets one of your Mooks, you can change the target to this Mook
Target enemy discards two cards, then draws two cards.

You can't fabricate Machines.

Your Mooks get +3 when defending.

Your Mooks can't be targeted by Schemes.

Whenever you take a Backup Plan, you can discard that card. If you do, draw a card.

You can blow up one of your Machines as a cost. If you do, target Mook gets +5 from radiation.

Target Mook gets -2 from radiation.
Immune to poison.

Requires 2 Mooks

Unique
Skilled Defender

At the start of your turn, blow up each Active Base. For each Base blown up this way, return target Mook to its owner's hand.

Requires 3 Mooks, 1 Machine, Turn 4 or later

Unique

Your Mooks have Skilled Attacker.
When this Mook onboards, target player tosses the top three cards of their Arsenal.

ðŸ”˜Blow up this Machine and one of your Mooks as a cost. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your Arsenal until you reveal a Mook. Hire the revealed Mook, ignoring its requirements, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of your Arsenal in any order.
ðŸ”˜Blow up this Machine as a cost. If you do, target Mook gets +7 until end of turn.

When this Mook onboards, draw a card.

When you take this Mook as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to hire it. If you do, draw a card.

factionAbility: At the start of your turn, if you have 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, if one or more of your Mooks would be blown up by an ability, they gain invincible until end of turn.
factionStaticAbility: After an enemy you're assaulting chooses defenders, you can have target Mook get Skilled Attacker until end of turn.
factionFlavorText: No plan survives first contact with the enemy. That's why I always have three plans.

text: When you take this Mook as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to hire it. When this Mook onboards this way, hire a token Mook.
Target player reveals their hand and discards all Schemes and Blueprints among them.
The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top card of your Arsenal. You can toss that card. Then draw a card.
Whenever you draw your first card each turn, you can discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Until end of turn, whenever one of your Mooks assaults, blow up target Machine.
You can fabricate an extra Machine each turn. When you do, draw a card.
Immune to poison, disease, and radiation.
Your Machines that are also Mooks have Skilled Attacker and Skilled Defender.

Your Active Base can't be targeted.

Whenever you switch your Active Base, blow up this Machine.

Requires Turn 3 or later

Hire a Mook from your hand, ignoring its requirements.

Put this card under target Mook that isn't yours and steal it. It can't declare an assault or use its activated effects.

Whenever its owner would draw a card, they can have you draw two cards instead. If they do, put this card in the Garbage Pile and this effect ends.
Whenever this Mook assaults, if it's blown up in combat or the assault fails, blow up target Machine.
Mooks in your hand have -1 to each of their requirements.

Requires 2 Mooks

While assaulting, this Mook gets +2 for each other assaulting Mook.

You can liquidate Mooks instead of other card types to pay costs.

Whenever you liquidate one or more Mooks to pay a cost, reveal cards from the top of your Arsenal until you reveal a Mook. Put it into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.
This Mook has Threat Level 6.

factionAbility: When you would draw a card, you exploit instead. To exploit, reveal the top card of your Arsenal and put it under one of your Mooks or Machines, or into your hand. When you exploit an empty Arsenal, you win the game.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, search your Arsenal for a Machine and put it facedown. You can fabricate it this turn.
factionStaticAbility: Whenever a player fabricates a Machine, exploit.
factionFlavorText: What do you mean the water is "poison"? A little runoff is good for the humors.

text: Whenever you draw one or more cards, target Mook gets -2 until end of turn for each card you drew.
When this Mook onboards, target player reveals their hand and each of their facedown cards. For each card revealed this way, this Mook gets +1 until end of turn.
When this Mook onboards, for each of your Blueprints, you can trigger its start-of-turn ability. If you do, you can't win the game because of that Blueprint this turn.
Look at the top three cards of your Arsenal. Hire one as a token Mook, put one into your hand, and toss the last one.
Enemies can't target your Blueprints or Mooks.

Unique
Skilled Attacker

When this Mook assaults, target Mook gets -5 from poison.

Your Scientists get +2.

Once per turn, when one of your Scientists is targeted, you can change that target to a Mook that isn't yours.

When an enemy blows up this Base, they reveal their hand and you choose a card from it. They discard that card.
Blow up target Machine and target facedown Machine.
Your Mooks are also Scientists.
Whenever an enemy assaults you with more than three Mooks, you can blow up this Machine as a cost before declaring defenders. If you do, blow up target Mook that's assaulting you.

Requires 1 Machine

Your other Lasergun Enforcers get +2.
When you fabricate this Machine, it becomes a Mook with Threat Level 6. Then, you can put up to two of your Machines under it. While it's a Mook, it gets +6 for each Machine card under it.
Onboarding abilities of Mooks you onboard trigger twice.

factionAbility: You start the game with a Blueprint from your Arsenal in play.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, you can fabricate three additional Machines this turn.
factionStaticAbility: The first time one of your Machines is blown up by an ability each turn, you can put that card on top of your Backup Plans faceup.
factionFlavorText: With this machine, I will be unstoppable!

text: This Mook onboards as a copy of target Mook.

Requires 2 Mooks

When this Mook assaults, it gets +1 for each of your Machines and -1 for each of the defending player's Machines.
At the start of your turn, if this Blueprint has 5 cards under it, each other player loses the game. If not, put one of your Backup Plans under it, face-up.
Blow up five target Mooks.

Requires 1 Mook, 1 Machine

While you're being assaulted, this Mook gets +8.

Once per turn, whenever you hire a nontoken Mook, hire a token Mook.

Your tokens Mooks have Threat Level 3.
ðŸ”˜Look at the top card of your Arsenal. If it's a Scheme, put it into your hand.

Requires 6 or more Schemes in your Garbage Pile

Unique

Once per turn, you can reveal cards from the top of your Arsenal until you reveal a Scheme. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.
This Mook gets +2 for each of your other Mooks.
When this Mook onboards, you can fabricate an additional Machine this turn.
ðŸ”˜Discard a Machine. Draw a card.

You cannot be assaulted by 3 or fewer Mooks.

Enemies can't target your Machines or facedown cards.

Requires 2 Mooks, 2 Bases

Unique
Skilled Attacker

Whenever this Mook assaults, blow up the defender's Active Base.

Enemies can't target you.

Whenever an enemy declares an assault, you can have one of your Machines become a Mook with threat level 6 until end of turn.

Enemy Mooks have +1 to each of their requirements.

Whenever you hire a nontoken Mook, you can discard a card. If you do, hire a token Mook.

Requires Turn 3 or later

Hire three token Mooks.
Choose target enemy and name a card type. They reveal the top three cards of their Arsenal. For each card of the chosen type revealed this way, draw a card. They toss those cards.

Draw two cards.

If you take this Scheme as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately. If you do, draw three cards instead.
Mooks assaulting you get -1 from poison.
You can fabricate an additional Machine during each of your turns.

Requires 3 politicians

Unique

The first time one of your Schemes resolves each turn, play it again.
Toss the top three cards of your Arsenal, then put the top card of your Arsenal on top of your Backup Plans.

factionAbility: At the start of the game, vote for who takes control. While you're in control, you draw an additional card at the start of your turn.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, take control. If you do, your Mooks get +2 until your next turn.
factionStaticAbility: If you start your turn in control, have 7 or more Mooks and have the most Mooks, you win the game.
factionFlavorText: Of course I'm the rightful ruler! Just ask the people I work for.

cardname: Put Your Brain In A Jar
text: Put this card under one of your machines. As long as this card is under that machine, you don't have to take backup plans. When this card is put into your trash heap, you lose the game from being dropped.

Requires 2 Mooks

Unique

At the end of your turn, any player can discard a card. If no one does, you can blow up target Machine and draw a card.
Unique Slippery (This Mook escapes combat if it would lose.)
Once per turn, reveal the top card of your Arsenal. If it's a Machine, play it facedown. If not, toss it.
Blow up all tokens.

Unique

Whenever one or more of your Mooks would be blown up, you can blow up any one of your Mooks instead.

Target enemy shuffles their hand into their Arsenal, then reveals that many cards plus two from the top. Separate the cards into two piles. They choose one pile and put it into their hand, then toss the other.

Requires 1 Machine

This Mook gets +8 while assaulting.

Requires Turn 6 or later

Unique
Skilled Attacker
Skilled Defender

Whenever this Mook assaults alone, it can't be blocked.
Unique Slippery (This Mook escapes combat if it would lose.) When this Mook escapes combat, blow up the Mooks it was blocking or blocked by. Your Mooks are immune to poison.
When you fabricate this Machine, put it under another Machine. If that Machine would be blown up by an ability, blow up this Machine instead.
Each player liquidates a Mook, Base, or Machine.
Toss cards from the top of your Arsenal until you find a Machine card. Put that card into your hand.

Blow up one of your Mooks as a cost. If you do, blow up target Machine.

When you take this Scheme as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.
Each player plays with the top card of their Arsenal revealed.

Skilled Attacker

When this Mook assaults a player successfully, remove up to one card from under target Blueprint they control.

You don't lose the game because of abilities.

When you're assaulted successfully, liquidate this Base and draw a card.

Play only when you're successfully assaulted.

Blow up target Mook that assaulted you. Draw a card.

Unique

Other players must assault during their turn if able, and that assault must be against players that aren't you, if able.

Play any time an assault is declared.

Until end of turn, Mooks lose Skilled Attacker and Skilled Defender.
Whenever one of your Mooks becomes the target of an effect, you can return that Mook to your hand.
Target player liquidates their Mook with the lowest threat level.
At the start of your turn, you can liquidate this Machine as a cost. If you do, blow up target Machine or Base.
Skilled Defender (This Mook can't be paired by the assaulting player.)
When this Mook onboards, steal target Machine.
When you fabricate this Machine, look at the top three cards of your Arsenal and put them back in any order.

You can only be assaulted by three or fewer Mooks.

You cannot hire a Mook unless you have more Machines than Mooks.
This Mook isn't blown up by combat with Mooks of Threat Level 6 or higher.
Whenever this Mook assaults, you can blow up a Mook, Machine, or Base (do this before the defender declares whether or not they're blocking).

Requires 1 Mook

Once per turn, you can look at target facedown Machine, then flip this Machine facedown.

Discard a card as a cost.

Draw three cards.
The first time you assault unsuccessfully each turn, you can declare "I'll be back". If you do, you can assault again this turn.

factionAbility: At the start of your turn, if you have 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, if you've got no cards in your hand, draw three cards.
factionStaticAbility: Your Mooks get +1 for each nontoken Mook you've hired this turn.
factionFlavorText: How do we win? Easy. The killbots have a preset kill limit. We'll simply throw men at them until they reach that limit.

text: Name a card type, then target enemy reveals the top three cards of their Arsenal. If any of those cards are of the chosen type, you draw a card. Then that player shuffles.
Your Mooks are also Henchmen.
Blow up every Machine. You can't fabricate Machines until the end of your next turn.

factionAbility: You start the game with a Blueprint from your Arsenal in play.
factionPressureAbility: Once per game, the next Scheme you play this turn has no costs and can't be stopped.
factionStaticAbility: Whenever another player plays a Scheme that targets one or more of your Blueprints, draw a card.
factionFlavorText: I will destroy the entire city, unless you pay me... one million dollars!

text:
Liquidate a Machine as a cost. If you do, blow up target Mook.

When you take this Scheme as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.
When this Mook assaults successfully, draw a card.
Search your Arsenal for up to three Machines. Choose one of them in secret and put it facedown. After you shuffle, put the rest on top in any order.
Until your next turn, enemies can't declare an assault against you unless they let you draw a card.

Unique

Your other Henchmen can't be targeted by the effects of enemy Mooks.

ðŸ”˜Target Henchman gets +5 until end of turn.
When this Mook onboards, hire a token Mook.

You can't be assaulted by Robots or Cyborgs.

At the start of your turn, you can liquidate a Machine. If you do, draw a card.
When this Mook onboards, you can reveal the top five cards of your Arsenal. If you do, put a Mook from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.
Whenever an enemy declares an assault, target one of their Mooks. That player may discard a card. If they don't, that Mook can't assault this turn.
Blow up target Machine, then draw a card. Then discard a card if it wasn't your Machine.

At the start of your turn, put one of your Machines under this Blueprint. Then, if this card has six or more Machines under it, it becomes a Mook with Threat Level 32, and has "When this Mook assaults successfully, the defending player loses the game."

Immune to Scientists

While this Mook is assaulting, defending Mooks get -1 from disease.
Whenever you would take a Backup Plan, you can put this card on top of your Backup Plans faceup instead. If you do, draw a card.

At the start of your turn, put the top card of your Arsenal under this card. Then, if this card has three or more Schemes under it, blow up target Base.

At the end of your turn, if this card has 8 or more Machines under it, you win the game.
When this Mook onboards, blow up every Mook. Until end of turn, whenever a Mook onboards, it's blown up by radiation.
Your Scientists get +2.
